# R Basics: Data Sets

## Goals for Today {-} 

* Practice loading a variety of different data sets into R 
* Learning about data frames, tibbles, and the `tidyverse` packages

## Readings for Today {-} 

### Required {-}

* Peng, [R Programming for Data Science - Chapter 5, Getting Data In and Out of R and Chapter 6, Using the `readr` Package](https://bookdown.org/rdpeng/rprogdatascience/getting-data-in-and-out-of-r.html) 
* Grolemund and Wickham, [R for Data Science - Part II](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/data-import.html)

### Optional {-}

* Julian Flowers, [Keep data tidy: A plea to data publishers and developers](https://nhsrcommunity.com/blog/keep-data-tidy-a-plea-to-data-publishers-and-developers/)
